Risk assessors like EFSA set Health-Based Guidance Values #HBGV, a threshold value indicating the safe level of a substance incl. #nutrients, for people & animals. What are they for? For decision-makers to set how much of a substance is permitted in #FoodAdditives, pesticides etc
